SEARCH
Package net.issachanzi.resteasy.model.association

Class BelongsToDao

java.lang.Object
net.issachanzi.resteasy.model.association.BelongsToDao
public class BelongsToDao extends Object
Data access object for performing database queries on associations where one side of the association is a BelongsTo association.

These associations are represented in the database by adding a foreign key to the main table of one of the models involved

  • Constructor Summary

    Construct a DAO for querying a specific pair of associations

    • BelongsToDao

      public BelongsToDao(Connection db, String tableName, String columnName)
      Construct a DAO for querying a specific pair of associations
      Parameters:
      db - The database connection to use
      tableName - The name of the table containing the foreign key
      columnName - The name of the column containing the foreign key

  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init() throws SQLException
      Adds the foreign key column to the table, as specified in the constructor.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database query fails

    • setForeignByPrimary

      public void setForeignByPrimary(UUID primaryKey, UUID foreignKey) throws SQLException
      Updates the foreign key stored in a row of the table, given the primary key of that row.

      Used to set or clear associations

      Parameters:
      primaryKey - The primary key of the row to set
      foreignKey - The foreign key to set in the row
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a query fails

    • clearAssociationByForeign

      public void clearAssociationByForeign(UUID foreignKey) throws SQLException
      Clears the foreign key column of all rows containing a given foreign key
      Parameters:
      foreignKey - The foreign key to remove associations for
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a query fails

    • getForeignByPrimary

      public UUID getForeignByPrimary(UUID primaryKey) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the foreign key stored in a given row
      Parameters:
      primaryKey - The primary key of the row to query
      Returns:
      The foreign key stored in that row
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a query fails

    • getPrimaryByForeign

      public UUID getPrimaryByForeign(UUID foreignKey) throws SQLException
      Gets the primary key of the row containing a given foreign key

      If there are multiple rows containing the given foreign key, gets the first one.

      This method is intended for one-to-one associations. For one-to-many associations, see getAllPrimaryByForeign(UUID).

      Parameters:
      foreignKey - The foreign key to search for
      Returns:
      The primary key of the matching row, or null if no rows contain the given foreign key
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the query fails

    • getAllPrimaryByForeign

      public UUID[] getAllPrimaryByForeign(UUID foreignKey) throws SQLException
      Gets the primary keys of all rows containing a given foreign key

      This method is intended for one-to-many associations. For one-to-one associations, see getPrimaryByForeign(UUID).

      Parameters:
      foreignKey - The foreign key to search for
      Returns:
      The primary keys of the matching rows, or an empty array if no rows contain the given foreign key
      Throws:
      SQLException - If the query fails
